dimarray documentation
======================

Welcome to dimarray documentation.

dimarray provide a `numpy` array with labelled axes and dimensions, in the spirit of 
`pandas` but generalized to N dimensions. It supports metadata and netCDF4 I/O.

.. toctree::

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    introduction.rst
    _build_rst/getting_started.rst
    _build_rst/examples.rst
    reference.rst
    reference_api.rst
    other_packages.rst

Contributions
=============
All suggestions for improvement or direct contributions are very welcome.
You can ask a question or start a discussion on the mailing list
or open an `issue` on github for precise requests. See  :ref:`links`.
